Html:
The Prism Quick Starts and RIs are too 'bulky'. There's too much code to wade through!

What's needed are simpler 'template' application(s), of the 'fill-in-the-blanks' type.

A template would probably include a simple template for each Prism concept, with minimal code, but plenty of useful comments.

The developer could then flesh out the template to build a working app.

I may not be understanding what you are saying, but can you look at the following and see if this is what you were talking about?

﻿http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dphill/archive/2010/06/08/updated-prism-template-pack-for-visual-studio-2010-rtm.aspx

﻿﻿

﻿

Hi reagan123,

Yes, David Hill's Prism Template Pack for Visual Studio 2010 does appear to be what I am looking for!

I haven't checked the templates in detail yet, but they sound good.

Thanks

Peter
